root: ^As always, well done on the installation! We're getting closer and closer to the end!
^Power supplys are categorized by the amount of power they provide in wattage. When purchasing a power supply, it's important to make sure it can supply enough power for everything!
^The two largest power draws on a computer are the CPU and the Graphics Card, and if they don't get enough power, your computer can run into errors, freeze up, or even break!

^Therefore, it is recommended to figure out how much power your computer parts will need ahead of time, and then purchase an appropriate wattage power supply. This is not a part you will want to cheap out on!
^Next up is the Hard Drive and Solid-State Drive. Select them from the menu when you are ready to proceed!
